name: Hand Jam
description:
A/D Left hand, Left/Right Arrows Right hand | Move Left/Right

W Left hand, Up Arrow Right hand | Jump

S Left hand, Down arrow Right hand| Attack

If you jump and hold both attack keys, you will perform a clap attack killing everything inbetween

@Renderbydavid | Code

@imonk | Graphics

We created this game for a hand jam :)
